name: Courtyard by Marriott Mankato

reviews.text: I really appreciate the upscale, quiet, comfortable accommodations this new Courtyard By Marriott provides me while working in the Mankato area! It is spotless clean, the rooms are spacious, great work spaces are provided throughout the hotel in and out of the guest rooms, cozy bedding, and the glass doored showers in the King Suite are a retreat! Plus, there are friendly smiles quick to serve! All this right next to River Hills Mall! Courtyard By Marriott is Mankato's finest!
reviews.title: Upscale, quiet, and spotless...coming from a HOTEL SNOB:)

reviews.text: the elevator was painfully slow but the property was clean and modern and the room was really comfortable. the outdoor patio was a nice place to relax with a glass of wine (and they had a great selection from CA), a book and friends. i didn't go to the pool/spa but i liked that they were open 24hrs a day.
reviews.title: slow elevator...!

reviews.text: the bed was comfortable, the room was dark and quiet, the bathroom was huge and really clean. the wifi connection in the room was easy to access and use.
reviews.title: Lovely newer property

reviews.text: breakfast choices were plentiful and reasonably priced. it was nice to have starbucks coffee available BUT i didn't like that they automatically put the coffee in a to go cup. i was eating in and could have easily used a mug and not a paper cup.
reviews.title: Best Hotel we've ever stayed at!

reviews.text: We stayed here during a softball tournament in New Ulm. Beautiful hotel, helpful staff. Despite being very busy (Softball Tournament guests and a Wedding), they offered to place us next to another family we were travelling with. Rooms were nice, location is good, not complaints!
reviews.title: Couldn't be Nicer

reviews.text: Our frequent travels to see family members brought us to Mankato and we again enjoyed the service and atmosphere at this property. We stayed in an upper room this time and enjoyed the modern decor and the clean facilities. The room was well-appointed and the front desk staff were friendly and called us by name several times during our check-in.
reviews.title: Very Good Repeat Performance

reviews.text: We did not eat a meal here and the only sub-standard event during the stay involved the Starbucks staff who had some difficulty creating a regular coffee with steamed skim milk. After several failed attempts, my wife finally received her coffee and off we went. We will always stay at this property, it is the very best in this community!
reviews.title: Excellent stay at Mankato Marriott

reviews.text: Stayed at the Mankato Courtyard by Marriott in Mankato, MN last weekend for a wedding reception that was at the hotel. We had a double queen room. The hotel room was very nice and modern in this new hotel. The staff was friendly and fun. Beds were comfortable and clean. Glad that there was a small refrigerator and coffee maker in our room. Will definately stay again. Walking distance to the Mankato shopping mall.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just spent the weekend here for a swim meet - excellent hotel and highly recommend it! As noted in prior reviews, it's very new, modern, clean and quiet and night (even during a busy weekend with many swim families & a wedding!). The staff is quite professional, friendly and accommodating. Inner courtyard with fire pit and lots of comfy furniture was great - we could also keep an eye on the kids in the indoor pool from there. Made-to-order breakfast food was delicious. We had the one-bedroom suite which was very spacious and beds were comfortable. The only minor complaint we have is that the fire pit was malfunctioning all night, which created an unpleasant gas smell after a while.
reviews.title: Good Location, Friendly staff.

reviews.text: We ended up staying in Mankato after a concert. We arrived later in the evening, fronk desk staff was very friendly and welcoming as we checked in.
reviews.title: Event Center

reviews.text: We have been anticipating the opening of this property for several months as construction wrapped up. We stayed at this nearly new property just before Christmas as we gathered with family members for an early holiday event. The property was not crowded or busy and we enjoyed the very new furnishings and the very 'green' technologies that were on display throughout the hotel. The room was somewhat small but well-laid out and nicely presented. The bathroom was spacious and we loved the large shower (no tub). Our only discomfort was the heating system which seemed to struggle against the 5 degree temps and cold Minnesota winds outside. The Courtyard-style food and beverage area was roomy and very attractive but basically uninhabited due to the impending holiday. We will be back to stay here when we travel to town again and we look forward to using this property several times each year!
reviews.title: Cold Night-Warm Welcome

reviews.text: We were so thrilled with our stay at the Courtyard in Mankato. It has a fantastic location right across from the mall and all the other major shopping at your fingertips. On top of that, the staff was very friendly and accommodating. We had a room right next to the elevator and didn't hear a thing, which was a surprise to me.
reviews.title: Wonderful Experience during a Busy Weekend!

reviews.text: The breakfast was delicious (especially that oatmeal - YUM!) and we were surprised at the quality for the price - very well done! Not to mention the staff at the restaurant were overly helpful and kind.
reviews.title: Great New Place!

reviews.text: We had a wonderful stay and have already talked about having a return trip for an overnight or weekend sometime soon. We live close enough to usually just make a day trip, but we had such a great time that we'll probably just come and stay overnight the next time.
reviews.title: Nice new hotel in Mankato

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool is so nice as well! I'll note (although we didn't use it) that the hot tub also has a lift for the disabled, which I thought was a nice touch.
reviews.title: New Motel

reviews.text: Extremely clean hotel and super comfortable beds. The front desk was very friendly and helpful on arrival. The location is ideal for walking and access to many businesses and restaurants. We will most certainly choose this hotel for any future stays in Mankato!
reviews.title: Clean, quiet, super comfortable

reviews.text: I recently met up with friends in Mankato, Mn and was so happy to find this hotel. We've stayed at many Courtyards and this is one of the best. The fact that is so new helps but the staff was wonderful. Christy went out of her way to get a cab for our girls night out. The Barista was friendly and make great Starbucks drinks when we needed them. The lobby was not loud. While waiting on my friends I sat in the lobby with my Starbucks drink and read with no problem. The area was very spacious. The outside courtyard area was fantastic! We sat out there and enjoyed the fire pit. We didn't use the indoor pool or hot tub but saw others enjoying it.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel

reviews.text: The mall is within walking distance and there is a Target on the other side, attached to the mall. While the hotel doesn't serve a free breakfast, I picked up donuts and fruit from Target. There is a small refrigerator in the room that works well. If I am ever in the area, I will defiantly stay here again.
reviews.title: "Freindly and Helpfull"

reviews.text: Very beautiful hotel and front desk was very accomadating. They were very helpfull in providing cab service and suggesting of entertainment for the evening. The location is in a very safe and clean area. Walking distance to a great mall. Would definitaly recomnend staying here.
reviews.title: Awesome Hotel

reviews.text: Extremely nice, new hotel in Mankato.
reviews.title: Awesome Hotel

reviews.text: Just stayed with my son at this hotel on a visit to the U. My complements to Preston and his team at making us feel welcome and most comfortable. One of the most friendly and accommodating group of employees I have run into in my travels. The rooms are brand new, clean and very nicely appointed. Conveniently located near the mall for a little shopping during our visit. The breakfast was delicious and easy. Priced right and well above the other standards in Mankato. Definitely worth the checking out.
reviews.title: Great New Hotel! Definitely Worth Checking Out.
It's the little things that matter!
reviews.text: The fantastic meeting rooms, the friendly (and very helpful) staff, the variety of great food options and close parking are only a few of the accommodations that make hosting the weekly Rotary meeting at the Courtyard by Marriott so easy. However, the fresh cookies are my favorite!

I came here for a meeting. The food was excellent (pastries and fruit for breakfast) with coffee, soda and bottled water throughout the day. The lunch buffet (sub sandwiches with all of the fixings, salads and extra tasty soup) was more than enough. We were able to eat outside on the patio, even though it was windy. Our drinks were always fresh and every staff had a smile. When I brought to our waitress' attention that we very much were enjoying everything and thanked her for being very attentive, she was humble about it and again, was not afraid to smile. I have recommended to my manager that we hold future meetings here. Very professional hotel.
reviews.title: VERY impressive.

reviews.text: Tis hotel is clean, comfortable, quiet and all just a nice place to stay generally. We're in town for a family function, and this was a great place to relax. The beds and linings were very comfortable, and e air conditioning system was just right. Other places we've stayed in Mankato, haven't been up to e same quality level as this hotel. Rooms and bathrooms a big and functional.
reviews.title: Highly recommend.

reviews.text: I've always thought of these "type" of hotels to kind of be all the same. To some extent that's right, but there are some aspects that make a difference. This hotel is one of those. The rooms are quite comfortable, reminding me more of a hilton level. That was a nice surprise, though nothing to put it over the top. What made the most difference for me was the real friendliness of the staff members. From the front desk to the patio/bar area, the folks seemed genuinely eager to please and quite friendly. Almost took me off guard actually.
reviews.title: Comfortable, well located, good value

reviews.text: Our daughter's wedding reception was only the third one at this new hotel. The staff was wonderful, the food was very, very good and Carmen Sook, Mariott Wedding Planner, was so great to work with as was Mona Mokoff, Event Manager. They listened to what we were hoping for and they delivered. The family members and friends that stayed over said the rooms were very clean, the beds very comfortable and the staff very accommodating. They really care about you and their friendliness is genuine. I would recommend this facility to anyone planning a wedding, banquet, conference or just needing a place to stay. The lobby area is so comfortable and there are so many gathering areas for either large groups to sit and visit or smaller more intimate conversational areas. Very well thought out.
reviews.title: Wedding Reception-Perfect Evening

reviews.text: Very impressed with the friendly helpful staff! They even offered to take our luggage up to the room! Our room was very nice and the bed was comfy. The room's floor plan was well thought out, with a table on rollers that slides in under the desk, access to plug ins for your phone or pc and having a shower instead of a bathtub. The event center and courtyard are laid out to accomodate events small or large! Very modern look and yet a very welcome feeling when you walk into the hotel.
reviews.title: Very Nice!

reviews.text: Very excited about this new hotel. I usually visit the area about once a year to visit friends and have been disappointed in the lodging choices up until now! This is a great property, staff is awesome and the rooms are really great. Love the layout. Did not use the pool or fitness center, but both looked nice. There is a great patio space that would be wonderful to hangout in during the summer months and even in the cooler months, there was a patio fireplace that looked very inviting.
reviews.title: Great New Property in Mankato

reviews.text: The only thing that i thought was not the best, was the speed of the elevators, i found them to be very slow and often chose to just take the stairs instead of waiting.
reviews.title: Very Nice!

reviews.text: Overall, i am so excited to have this new option in the Mankato area and would highly recommend.
reviews.title: BEST STAY IN MANKATO

description: Mankato's newest and Minnesota's first LEED certified hotel, the Courtyard by Marriott Hotel & Event Center welcomes you. We are conveniently located off of hwy 14, next to Scheels All Sports at River Hills Mall. We are within minutes of the Verizon Wireless Center, Minnesota State University Mankato, Mt. Kato, and many other great places. Our 93 deluxe hotel rooms have pillow-top Serta mattresses, refrigerator, microwave and 32" flat screen TV's, with 100 HD channels featuring Direct TV. We offer free wired and wireless internet in every room and throughout the hotel. Located in our comfortable and spacious lobby we have our Bistro Restaurant & Bar, where you can EAT, DRINK, and CONNECT. It is open for breakfast and 5-10pm for dinner. We proudly serve STARBUCK'S COFFEE 24hrs a day for your convenience. After a long day you can relax in our indoor pool and whirlpool. Grab a drink and hang out by the fire pit located in our enhanced courtyard. In our 24hr workout facility we feature Life Fitness equipment, with flat screen TV's on each machine also with Direct TV. Our Event Center is prefect for weddings, small events and meetings. Our Event Center can accommodate up to 400 people, and can be divided into 4 smaller sections to accommodate your group. Whether you're in town for business, leisure, an event, or just want to get away for a night. Call and make a reservation today, our professional and friendly staff would love to help you enjoy your stay in Mankato, Minnesota.
